name: wide-lens
effect: Held: Increases the accuracy of any move the holder uses by 10% (multiplied; i.e. 70% accuracy is increased to 77%).
short_effect: Held: Provides a 1/10 (10%) boost in accuracy to the holder.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.
